item.title: FDA OKs Blood-Based Test to Help Diagnose Prostate Cancer
item.description: Premarket approval means IsoPSA testing can now be done at certified labs nationwide. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Step Counts May Signal Early Signs of Parkinson's Disease
item.description: Low daily step counts predict Parkinson's disease years before diagnosis but are likely a sign of early disease, not a risk factor. Medscape News UK

item.title: Scoliosis Surgery Cuts Pneumonia Risk in Cerebral Palsy
item.description: In children with cerebral palsy, surgery for scoliosis lowers the incidence of pneumonia requiring hospitalisation and the risk for pneumonia-related ...

item.title: Patients and Their Activity Levels: Perception vs Reality
item.description: Patients with chronic conditions in a French cohort often misestimate their physical activity levels; just over half meet the recommended guidelines, ...

item.title: Beta-Blockers After MI Show Mixed Benefit in Preserved EF
item.description: Two NEJM trials report conflicting results on long-term beta-blockers after MI in patients with preserved ejection fraction, prompting renewed debate ...
